title: MissionFlow – United Airlines Airshop Lab
details: Developed a comprehensive web app in collaboration with United Airlines’ Airshop Lab to manage robotic R&D missions, enhancing scalability and innovation.
Automated mission file management and execution, centralizing data, and reducing manual overhead by 50%.
Integrated analytics and Boston Dynamics APIs for real-time robot insights and mission control, cutting error rates by 15%.
Improved UI responsiveness and data visualization through modular React components and optimized REST APIs.

title: NASA Renewable Energy Data Visualization
details: Leveraged NASA’s POWER dataset to analyze solar and wind potential across U.S. counties, providing insights into renewable energy feasibility.
Built an interactive visualization using React with dynamic color-coded maps and filtering tools to compare energy trends.
Developed a high-performance, stateless REST API with Node.js and MongoDB for efficient data retrieval.
Presented research findings at the 2023 ESIP Meeting, demonstrating real-world applications of open energy data.

title: Ryan’s Ice Cream Online Ordering System
details: Designed and implemented an online cake-ordering platform using AppFront and Figma, improving user experience and increasing sales by 35%.
Integrated secure payment processing, inventory tracking, and order management features, reducing manual errors by 20%.
Collaborated with stakeholders to gather requirements and perform user testing, ensuring intuitive and maintainable UI design.
Delivered a robust backend supporting data-driven insights and future scalability.

title: RPI Foodies Dining Hall Ranking Platform
details: Built a community-driven dining ranking site allowing RPI students to share, rate, and discuss campus meals.
Implemented weekly food ranking algorithms based on user engagement and feedback.
Developed admin tools for content moderation, ensuring platform reliability and security.
Enabled a clean responsive interface for mobile and desktop users.
